name: V for Vendeta
description:
V for Vendetta is a 1st person, 2D, single-player, point-and-click, story, puzzle game for PC that is based on the movie V for Vendetta and depicts V's past in the Larkhill Resettlement Camp. The game shows what happened before the events of the movie. The player controls V, who is currently in the Larkhill Resettlement Camp and is at the end his plan, he gets out of his cell, needs to go past the guards, find the last products that he needs to create a bomb that will blow up the camp.

This was the first game I created, It was solo developed in the space of a month as part of the DJD discipline in the first year of the Video Games degree program.
